index.title: Open Study Japanese
index.body.title: Whenever, Wherever,
char.title: CHARACTER

about.title2: who live life to the full
about.aboutUs.title: ABOUT US
about.aboutUs.p1: Things are always popping up in your head at the end of a tiring day when you are on the bed.
about.aboutUs.p3: Such things that you wanted to start, but always stacked aside.
about.aboutUs.p4: we regret not having done those things little by little.
about.aboutUs.p6: You know 'The beginning is half of the whole.'
about.aboutUs.p9: Open Study Japanese helps you study Japanese without any burdens.
about.aboutUs.p11: Experience a simple and new way of Japanese study with Open Study Japanese,
about.aboutUs.p12: while waiting for your friends, on the subway and lying on the bed, any time and anywhere.
about.aboutUs.keyP1: Don’t feel like studying. Just click on the green button, and look.
about.aboutUs.keyP2: It's only important to beginning with no pressure.
about.tutorial.title: How To Use
about.tutorial.summary1: Open Study Japanese offers you the best practices in learning for every topic.
about.tutorial.summary2: You can maximize effectiveness of memorizing ability by customizing the application.
about.tutorial.character.p1: A character table of Hiragana/Katakana are provided with test page.
about.tutorial.character.p2: By repeating this, you can master Hiragana and Katakana effectively.
about.tutorial.character.step1: ① Simply look through it. Don’t try to memorize those at your first try.
about.tutorial.character.step2: ② Just start test, once you are familiar with them.
about.tutorial.character.step3: ③ Find your weak points through the test, get back to the characters, study and test again.
about.tutorial.word-kanji.p1: Word - All JLPT Words by Level(N1~N5) are listed.
about.tutorial.word-kanji.p2: Kanji - All 2136 Joyo Kanji are listed
about.tutorial.word-kanji.p3: Check your daily status at the end of the day.
about.tutorial.word-kanji.step1: ① For beginners, activate ‘See all’ mode and look over daily words.
about.tutorial.word-kanji.step2: ② When you feel familiar, activate ‘Hide' mode and start the test.
about.tutorial.word-kanji.step3: ※ For those who study for JLPT exam, ‘Hide meaning’ mode is preferred. For those who study for Japanese conversation, ‘Hide word’ is preferred.
about.donate.title: User Participation
about.donate.p1: Open Study Japanese is running privately. All services and contents are free.
about.donate.p2: For continuous service providing, it will be appreciated if you donate to us or support by clicking our advertisements.
about.donate.p3: We will ensure the better quality of our services and contents.
about.donate.name: Open Study Japanese
